hadiths.text: Abu Sa’id al-Khudri reported the Messenger of Allah (May peace be upon him) as saying :When you hear the Adhan, you should repeat the same words as the mu’adhdhin pronounces

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقُولُ إِذَا سَمِعَ الْمُؤَذِّنَ
chapter.eng-name: What Should Be Said When One Hears The Mu'adhdhin
